item.title: Dentist suggestions on Teeth Cleaning
item.description: As we brush our teeth twice a day in such cases as well, do we really need teeth cleaning? And why does the Dentist say to have teeth cleaning in such cases also?. Letâ€™s understand what it is actually from a Dentist. In Dental terminology, teeth cleaning is referred to as "Scaling". So what is this "Scaling"? While you visit a Dentist for S
